personalInfo.clubAffl: Country Club of Lexington (Lexington, South Carolina)

tourBios.curYrHigh: Took runner-up honors at the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica Q-School held in Sebring, Florida in January. Lost to Willy Pumarol on the third hole of a sudden death playoff for the first spot and full exempt status for the season.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the South Carolina Match Play Championship in 2001, while attending Dutch Fork High School. His High School team won the State Championship in 2002.
tourBios.personal: Attended The Citadel... Favorite golf curse he's played is Reflection Bay Golf Club in Lake Las Vegas... His favorite professional teams are the Atlanta Braves and the Carolina Panthers... Kevin Hart, Will Ferrell and Bill Murray would round out his dream foursome.

tourBios.curYearHigh: Took runner-up honors at the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica Q-School held in Sebring, Florida in January. Lost to Willy Pumarol on the third hole of a sudden death playoff for the first spot and full exempt status for the season.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri was T51st in 2015 at the Dominican Republic Open.
